pos_mean_info_list.mean: 害怕的；受惊的；受恐吓的
害怕；使吃惊；吓走（frighten的过去分词）
可怕；丑恶；讨厌；令人毛骨悚然

word_group.brief_definition: 可怕的图片；可怕的画面
可怕的思想；令人诧异的思想
可怕的增长；惊人的增长
可怕的下降；可怕的跳伞；可怕的去接送

bilingual.source: Patients researching their health often come across frightening statistics.
bilingual.target: 病人研究自己健康状况时常碰到令人恐惧的统计数字。

bilingual.source: It was a very frightening experience and they were very courageous.
bilingual.target: 那是一次非常令人恐惧的经历，但他们非常勇敢。

bilingual.source: These adjectives refer to what is of a mysteriously strange, usually frightening nature.
bilingual.target: 这些形容词用来指那些神秘地奇怪，通常令人恐惧的东西。

bilingual.source: Drug marketing is merging with medical science in a fascinating and frightening way, raising questions about whether a new approach to defining diseases is warranted.
bilingual.target: 医药营销与医学科学正以令人着迷和令人恐惧的方式融合，关于是否应用一种定义疾病的新方法是正当的，这些问题浮现出来。

bilingual.source: He was mean and nasty and frightening too.
bilingual.target: 他既刻薄又讨厌，还很吓人。

bilingual.source: I don't like horror films who are too frightening.
bilingual.target: 我不喜欢太吓人的恐怖片。

bilingual.source: The man dressed in a ghost costume looks quite frightening.
bilingual.target: 穿着鬼服装的男人看起来相当吓人。

bilingual.source: My most frightening but magical experience was now captured forever in a single image.
bilingual.target: 我最恐怖但神奇的经历现在被永远定格在一张照片中。
世界末日的想法让人感到恐惧。

list.abstract: 英 [ˈfraɪtnɪŋ] adj. 吓人;令人恐惧的;引起突然惊恐的

yingyinNormal.en: Childhood ain't so jolly. In fact, it's rather frightening. Agree?
yingyinNormal.zh: 并不愉快的童年，事实上，周遭环境也很可怕，是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: And as frightening as it may be, that pain will make you stronger.
yingyinNormal.zh: 痛苦也许令人很恐惧，但它们会使你更强大。

yingyinNormal.en: You can't imagine how frightening the modern world will seem to her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你无法想象今天的世界对她会有多么可怕。嗯。

yingyinNormal.en: And he's scary. And he's frightening. And he's the death of all good things.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他好吓人，凶神恶煞，他是带来一片黑暗的瘟神。

yingyinNormal.en: Jordan Baker. A very famous golfer. She was the most frightening person I'd ever seen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔丹·贝克，著名高尔夫球手。她是我见过的最让人手足无措的人。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, most frightening, most authentic, most accurate visualization of a scientific principal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 比如最吓人奖，最逼真奖，科学原理演示之最佳视觉效果奖。

yingyinNormal.en: Really interesting is that you know, for many people, a lion is a frightening animal, but here it is funny, comic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真是有意思，对许多人来说，狮子是让人生畏的动物。不过在这里，狮子又有趣又滑稽。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah. Frightening is just one face for the lion. Okay. He also has many other faces. Right. Just like now, he is drinking wine. It's brilliant.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊。让人害怕只是狮子的一面。它还有很多其它特点。对。就像现在，它在喝酒。太精彩了。

yingyinNormal.en: A, that was not a joke. That was a sincere request. And B, more importantly, I was the outsider to this group, and I know how frightening that can be.
yingyinNormal.zh: 首先，那可不是开玩笑，那是个真诚的请求，其次，更重要的是我曾经是这个小团体中的局外人，我知道初次见面的感觉有多可怕。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 可怕的, 令人恐惧的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 可怕的, 令人恐惧的

examination_example.sentence: Interviews can be quite <highlight>frightening</highlight> but our top five tips can help you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 面试可能会很可怕，但是我们的五大技巧可以帮助你。

examination_example.sentence: Then we heard a <highlight>frightening</highlight> sound after a bright flash of lightning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后我们听到一道闪电后发出可怕的声音。
